Schnittstelle GUIConstants

Alle Superschnittstellen:
UserStringConstants
Alle bekannten Implementierungsklassen:
AnswerRowPanel, AnswersPanel, MessagePanel, MyButtonPanel, QFrame, QuestionButtonPanel, QuestionListPanel, QuestionMetaPanel, QuestionPanel, QuizButtonPanel, QuizHeaderPanel, QuizInfoViewPanel, QuizMainPanel, QuizQuestionMainPanel, QuizStatisticsMainPanel, QuizThemeInfoView, QuizThemeMainPanel, SessionsTrendChart, StatisticsBarChart, TabPane, ThemeButtonPanel, ThemeHeaderPanel, ThemeListPanel, ThemePanel
public interface GUIConstants extends UserStringConstants
Central GUI constants for the entire quiz application. Provides frame dimensions, colors, fonts, sizes, etc. (excluding user-displayed strings). User-displayed strings are now located in UserStringConstants.
Seit:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Autor:
Christos Poulios
